content.rendered:
Directed by Radha Krishna Jagarlamudi. Kangana Ranaut.

Written by Vijayendra Prasad. Prasoon Joshi. Himanshu Tripathi. Abhimanyu Srivastava.

Cast Kangana Ranaut(Manikarnika). Danny Denzongpa(Ghulam Ghaus Khan). Suresh Oberoi(Peshwa of Bithoor). Atul Kulkarni(Tatya Tope). Kulbhushan Kharbanda(Dixit Ji). Jisshu Sengupta(Gangadhar). Mohd. Zeeshan Ayyub(Sadashiv Rao (as Zeeshan Ayub)). Ankita Lokhande(Jhalkari). Mishti(Kashi (as Mishti Chakraborty)). Richard Keep(Hugh Rose). Edward Sonnenblick(Gordon). Unnati Davara(Mundar). Suparna Marwah(Rajamata). Vaibhav Tatwawadi(Puran Singh (as Vaibhav Tatwawaadi)). Nihar Pandya(Rao). Aarav Jaiswal(Damodar Rao). Anil George(Pir Ali). Vikram Kochhar(Nana (as Vikram Kochar)). Manish Wadhwa(Moropant). Tahir Mithaiwala(Sangram Singh). Thakur Rajveer Singh(Teer Singh’s Assistant (as Rajveer Singh)). Prakash Jha(Villager #2). Avnisha Dubey(Maid #1). Pooja Patel(Maid #3). Bharat Purohit(Little Tatya Tope). Sanjay Verma(Young Peshwa of Bithoor). Priya Gamre(Sundar). Romit Puri(Sadashiv’s Man). Mazid Khan(Jhansi Old Villager). Vishal Sharma(Indian Daroga). Lata Shukla(Old Lady). Neeta Sadhu(Sumitra). Rick Maclane(British Officer #2).  

Languages Hindi. Tamil. Telugu.

Producers Vinod Babeley. Kamal Jain. Aby John. Hetvi Karia. Nasir Khan. Sujay Kutty. Mukti K. Mohanty. Atul Parab. Nishant Pitti. Mehjabeen Raja. Rakesh RudraVanka. Yogiraj Shetty. Roshan Singh. Zoeb Springwala. Yogesh Tevatia. Ravinder Thakur. Abhishek Vyas.

Production Kairos Kontent Studio. Zee Studio.
